Description_lang: The Shadowflame Amalgamation calls down a dark meteor nearby, inflicting $s1 Shadowflame damage split evenly among all players within $a1 yards of the impact location. If $@spellname405458 fails to hit at least $s3 players, it detonates and inflicts $406589s1 Shadowflame damage to all players.The impact creates an orb of energy that detonates shortly afterwards, inflicting $405640s1 Shadowflame damage to all players. Players farther from the detonation point receive less damage.
